item.title: SplitUp! - a tab manager for Google Chrome extension
Browser Extensions Threat Modeling
item.description: This is a report I wrote for one of courses while doing my master studies. Some parts are heavily influced by other realted studies. Please check References section Introduction Today, users surf the internet using browsers such as Google Chrome, Firefox, Safari, IE (Edge) etc., these are main browsers are being utilized by users. Statistically, 56.31% of the users use Chrome as their default browser [1]. Therefore, we will mostly focus on Chrome and discuss the way the company protects users from malicious threats from the extensions.
